name: Build Ur Garden
description:
NOTE: give it some time to load, it will take approx. 20 seconds, but it will be worth it :).

play in your browser! (And please leave a comment)

This was created in 2 days, so go easy please :).

This "game" is a seed based map generator, which procedurally places rocks, plants, animals, plants and randomizes the atmosphere from a single 10 number long seed.

Now with 3D surround sound!

it contains:

60+ Trees

42+ plants

30+ animals

and more!

more than a trillion different possible combinations!

It is just for experimenting and messing around (there are definitely seeds that break the algorithm ;) ). But it could definitely be built upon and expanded in the future.

This is my submission for the Github game off 2021. Themed: BUG, (hence the acronym,  (I know) )

It's definitely full of bugs but It's a work in progress, feel free to reach out to me at o.s.dr.who@gmail.com for comments or forks.
